nodes.text: "Credman" was the alias of a weapons collector active by the date 44:9:4:85, who was a commentator on items sold in Gundark's Gear Datalog. Credman spent several years living on the planet Guiteica, learning the method for creating dematoils, which were morningstars wielded by the native Bitthævrians. Credman was able to create the basic ball and chain, but believed they would never be able to touch one that had quills attached. Credman was, however, willing to pay a lot of money to anyone selling a dematoil with quills attached, no questions asked.

Credman was also the owner of a rantok, which the collector had found. Despite being offered tens of thousands of credits, Credman refused to sell it because of its rarity. Credman noted that the weapon was unwieldy to use but with practice it was a formidable weapon.
Credman also commented on several other entries, including the taser staff, the Sevari Flashpistol, and the StarAnvil heavy blaster rifle.
